import React from 'react' import {connect} from 'react-redux' class CategoryMenu extends React.Component { render() { return(
Mobiles Headphones Laptops
TV Washing Machine Air Conditioners
Men's Watch Women's Watch
) } } const mapStateToProps = (state) =>{ return { categories : state.categories } } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CategoryMenu)
